content: पूगः [पू-गन् किच्च्; <ls>Uṇ. 1. 121</ls>] {@--1@} {1} A multitude, heap, collection, quantity; <ls>Śi. 9. 64.</ls> {@--2@} An association, corporation, union; <ls>Y. 2. 30</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 151.</ls> {@--3@} The areca or betelnut-tree (पूगी also); <ls>R. 4. 44</ls>; <ls n="R.">6. 64</ls>; <ls n="R.">13. 17.</ls> {@--4@} Nature, property, disposition. --गं Areca-nut, betelnut.
